 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
We discovered a site that is scraping content of other sites, including
ours. The site is foryourhealthinfo.com and the ip address is
67.19.28.98. 
We discover this by searching on one of our product keywords and our
domain name in Yahoo: gaspari nutrition novedex summitsupplements.com.
The page is translated into Arabic but you can see the source code is
ours. An example of a link that comes up in those search results is
http://www.foryourhealthinfo.com/arabic.php?u=arabic.php%3Fu%3Dhttp://ww
w.su
mmitsupplements.com/. 
  
Your attention to this matter is appreciated. 
  
Best regards,
Tracey Welch 
  
--
Tracey Welch
Customer Service
Summit Supplements, Inc. 
Reach Your Peak! 
http://www.summitsupplements.com <http://www.summitsupplements.com/>
 <mailto:Tracey@summitsupplements.com> Tracey@summitsupplements.com
